plain: Based on the user's favorite books, it can be inferred that their favorite genre is likely literature, their favorite kind of plot is likely character-driven, their favorite setting is likely historical, their favorite writing style is likely descriptive, their favorite length is likely novel-length, their favorite topic is likely social commentary, their favorite pacing is likely slow-burn, their favorite narrative structure is likely third-person omniscient, and their favorite themes are likely feminism and social criticism.
